fullplot: Lisa and Julien are married and lead a happy uneventful life with their son Oscar. But their life radically changes one morning, when the police comes to arrest Lisa on murder charges. She's sentenced to 20 years of prison. Convinced of his wife's innocence, Julien decides to act. How far will he be willing to go for her?
plot: With no legal means left to him, a high school teacher devises a daring plan to rescue his wrongfully imprisoned wife from jail.
title: Anything for Her

tomatoes.consensus: This taut and snappy French prison break thriller may be suspiciously implausible, but is held together by two fine central performances.
